00036 #ifndef COMM_REQ_COMMAND_COUNT
00037 #define COMM_REQ_COMMAND_COUNT         10
00038 #endif
00039 #ifndef COMM_REQ_SERVER_CLUSTER_COUNT
00040 #define COMM_REQ_SERVER_CLUSTER_COUNT  4
00041 #endif
00042 #ifndef COMM_REQ_CLIENT_CLUSTER_COUNT
00043 #define COMM_REQ_CLIENT_CLUSTER_COUNT  4
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 // Multi-sensor specific structures - TX pairing Configuration
00047 #define PRECOMMISSIONED_PAIRED_ENDPOINT 0xFE
00048 #define ZGP_APPLICATION_DESCR_PAIRING_CONFIG_TIMEOUT 1000
00049 #define MAX_SINGLE_REPORT_DESC_LEN  25
00050 #define INVALID_LENGTH 0xFF
00051 // Multi-sensor specific structures
00052 #define ZGP_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TIMEOUT_BIT_MASK (1u << 0)
00053 #define IS_ZGP_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TIMEOUT_PRESENT(a) (a & ZGP_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TIMEOUT_BIT_MASK)
00054 
00055 #define ZGP_ATTR_RECORD_REMAINING_LENGTH(a) (a & 0xF)
00056 #define ZGP_ATTR_VALUE_PRESENT_BIT_POS 5
00057 #define IS_ZGP_ATTR_VALUE_PRESENT(a) ((a >> ZGP_ATTR_VALUE_PRESENT_BIT_POS) & 0x1)
00058 
00059 #define ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_NO_OF_ATTRIBUTE_RECORDS_MASK 0x7
00060 #define ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_NO_OF_ATTRIBUTE_RECORDS(a) (a & ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_NO_OF_ATTRIBUTE_RECORDS_MASK)
00061 
00062 #define ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_CLIENT_SERVER_BIT_POS 3
00063 #define ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_CLIENT_SERVER(a) ((a >> ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_CLIENT_SERVER_BIT_POS) & 0x1)
00064 
00065 #define ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_MANUFAC_ID_PRESENT_BIT_POS 4
00066 #define IS_ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_MANUFAC_ID_PRESENT(a) ((a >> ZGP_DATAPOINT_DESC_MANUFAC_ID_PRESENT_BIT_POS) & 0x1)
00067 
00068 #define ZGP_ATTR_REPORTED_BIT_POS 4
00069 #define IS_ZGP_ATTR_REPORTED(a)    ((a >> ZGP_ATTR_REPORTED_BIT_POS) & 0x1)
00070 
00071 #define ZGP_GENERIC_SWITCH_MIN_LENGTH 0x02
00072 #define INVALID_CONTACT_VALUE 0x00
00073 
00074 #if MICROCHIP_APPLICATION_SUPPORT == 1
00075   #ifdef  BOARD_PC

00077   #else
00078     #define appSnprintf(...) appSnprintf(__VA_ARGS__)
00079   #endif
00080 #else
00081 #define appSnprintf(...) do{}while(0)

00086 typedef enum _ZGP_InfraDeviceStatus_t
00087 {
00088   ZGP_SUCCESS                         = 0x00,
00089   ZGP_ALREADY_IN_COMMISSIONING_MODE   = 0x01,
00090   ZGP_ENDPOINT_NOT_REGISTERED         = 0x02,
00091   ZGP_INVALID_ACTION                  = 0x03,
00092   ZGP_NO_FREE_ENTRY                   = 0x04,
00093   ZGP_ENTRY_NOT_AVAILABLE             = 0x05,
00094   ZGP_INSUFFICIENT_SPACE_STATUS       = 0x06,
00095   ZGP_NOT_IN_EXPECTED_STATE           = 0x07
00096 } ZGP_InfraDeviceStatus_t;
00097 
00098 typedef struct
00099 {
00100   uint8_t macSeqNoCapability      : 1;
00101   uint8_t rxOnCapability          : 1;
00102   uint8_t applicationInfoPresent  : 1;
00103   uint8_t reserved                : 1;

00105   uint8_t gpSecurityKeyRequest    : 1;
00106   uint8_t fixedLocation           : 1;
00107   uint8_t extOptionsField         : 1;
00108 } zgpCommCmdReqOptions_t;

00116   uint8_t gpdOutgoingCounterPresent  : 1;
